from wh_warehouse ww left join sys_user su on ww.create_by=su.user_id left join sys_user su2 on ww.update_by=su2.user_id left join sys_user su3 on ww.w_supervisor=su3.user_id left join sys_dept sd on sd.dept_id = su3.dept_id

select a.w_id, a.w_code, a.w_name, a.w_capacity, a.`status`, a.w_address, a.is_default, a.is_lock, a.w_supervisor,su3.user_name supervisorUser, a.remark, a.sort, a.create_by,su.user_name oneuser, a.create_time, a.update_by,sd.dept_name deptName,sd.phone tel, su2.user_name twouser, a.update_time, a.is_delete, b.sl_id as sub_sl_id, b.w_id as sub_w_id, b.sl_code as sub_sl_code, b.sl_name as sub_sl_name, b.location_capacity as sub_location_capacity, b.position_manager as sub_position_manager, b.sort as sub_sort, b.`status` as sub_status, b.remark as sub_remark, b.create_by as sub_create_by, b.create_time as sub_create_time, b.update_by as sub_update_by, b.update_time as sub_update_time, b.is_delete as sub_is_delete,(select count(*)from wh_storage_location where w_id=a.w_id)storageNum from wh_warehouse a left join wh_storage_location b on b.w_id = a.w_id left join sys_user su on a.create_by=su.user_id left join sys_user su2 on a.update_by=su2.user_id left join sys_user su3 on a.w_supervisor=su3.user_id left join sys_dept sd on sd.dept_id = su3.dept_id where a.w_id = #{wId}

mapper.select: select wsl.sl_id,wsl.w_id, wsl.sl_code,wsl.sl_name, wsl.location_capacity,wsl.position_manager,su3.user_name manager, wsl.sort,wsl.`status`, wsl.remark,wsl.create_by,su.user_name creater, wsl.create_time,wsl.update_by,su2.user_name updater,wsl.update_time, wsl.is_delete from wh_storage_location wsl inner join sys_user su on wsl.create_by=su.user_id inner join sys_user su2 on wsl.update_by=su2.user_id inner join sys_user su3 on wsl.position_manager=su3.user_id where wsl.w_id=#{w_id}

SELECT ww.w_name, tatalQuantity, allQuantity, tatalQuantity/allQuantity AS ratio FROM ( SELECT ws.w_id, SUM(item_quantity) AS tatalQuantity FROM wh_stock ws GROUP BY ws.w_id ) AS sub1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT SUM(item_quantity) AS allQuantity FROM wh_stock ) AS sub2 ON 1=1 INNER JOIN wh_warehouse ww ON sub1.w_id = ww.w_id;

SELECT t1.totalPrice, t1.w_name, t2.allPrice,totalPrice/allPrice AS ratio FROM (SELECT SUM(ws.item_quantity * wg.wr_price) AS totalPrice, ww.w_name FROM wh_stock ws INNER JOIN wh_goods wg ON ws.g_id = wg.g_id INNER JOIN wh_warehouse ww ON ww.w_id = ws.w_id GROUP BY ws.w_id) t1, (SELECT SUM(ws.item_quantity * wg.wr_price) AS AllPrice FROM wh_stock ws INNER JOIN wh_goods wg ON ws.g_id = wg.g_id) t2;

SELECT DATE(dt.d) AS date, COALESCE(SUM(wd.quantity_inbound), 0) AS iNnum, COALESCE(SUM(wd.quantity_inbound * wd.pu_price), 0) AS inPrice FROM ( SELECT CURDATE() - INTERVAL (a.a + (10 * b.a) + (100 * c.a)) DAY AS d FROM (SELECT 0 AS a UNION ALL SELECT 1 UNION ALL SELECT 2 UNION ALL SELECT 3 UNION ALL SELECT 4 UNION ALL SELECT 5 UNION ALL SELECT 6 UNION ALL SELECT 7 UNION ALL SELECT 8 UNION ALL SELECT 9) AS a CROSS JOIN (SELECT 0 AS a UNION ALL SELECT 1 UNION ALL SELECT 2 UNION ALL SELECT 3 UNION ALL SELECT 4 UNION ALL SELECT 5 UNION ALL SELECT 6 UNION ALL SELECT 7 UNION ALL SELECT 8 UNION ALL SELECT 9) AS b CROSS JOIN (SELECT 0 AS a UNION ALL SELECT 1 UNION ALL SELECT 2 UNION ALL SELECT 3 UNION ALL SELECT 4 UNION ALL SELECT 5 UNION ALL SELECT 6 UNION ALL SELECT 7 UNION ALL SELECT 8 UNION ALL SELECT 9) AS c ) AS dt LEFT JOIN wh_inbound wh ON DATE(wh.storage_date) = DATE(dt.d) LEFT JOIN wh_inbound_details wd ON wh.in_id = wd.in_id WHERE dt.d >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 6 DAY) GROUP BY DATE(dt.d) ORDER BY DATE(dt.d);

SELECT DATE(dt.d) AS date, COALESCE(SUM(wd.outbound_quantity), 0) AS oNnum, COALESCE(SUM(wd.outbound_quantity * wd.pu_price), 0) AS outPrice FROM ( SELECT CURDATE() - INTERVAL (a.a + (10 * b.a) + (100 * c.a)) DAY AS d FROM (SELECT 0 AS a UNION ALL SELECT 1 UNION ALL SELECT 2 UNION ALL SELECT 3 UNION ALL SELECT 4 UNION ALL SELECT 5 UNION ALL SELECT 6 UNION ALL SELECT 7 UNION ALL SELECT 8 UNION ALL SELECT 9) AS a CROSS JOIN (SELECT 0 AS a UNION ALL SELECT 1 UNION ALL SELECT 2 UNION ALL SELECT 3 UNION ALL SELECT 4 UNION ALL SELECT 5 UNION ALL SELECT 6 UNION ALL SELECT 7 UNION ALL SELECT 8 UNION ALL SELECT 9) AS b CROSS JOIN (SELECT 0 AS a UNION ALL SELECT 1 UNION ALL SELECT 2 UNION ALL SELECT 3 UNION ALL SELECT 4 UNION ALL SELECT 5 UNION ALL SELECT 6 UNION ALL SELECT 7 UNION ALL SELECT 8 UNION ALL SELECT 9) AS c ) AS dt LEFT JOIN wh_outbound wo ON DATE(wo.outbound_date) = DATE(dt.d) LEFT JOIN wh_outbound_details wd ON wo.out_id = wd.out_id WHERE dt.d >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 6 DAY) GROUP BY DATE(dt.d) ORDER BY DATE(dt.d);

select g_id,g_name,count(goods_id)inBoundTimes,sum(quantity_inbound)inBoundQuantitys, sum(quantity_inbound*pu_price)inBoundPuPrices from wh_inbound_details wid inner join wh_goods wg on wid.goods_id=wg.g_id inner join wh_inbound wi on wi.in_id=wid.in_id where wi.`status`='done' GROUP BY goods_id ORDER BY inBoundTimes desc,inBoundQuantitys desc, inBoundPuPrices desc

select g_id,g_name,count(goods_id)outBoundTimes,sum(outbound_quantity)outBoundQuantitys, sum(outbound_quantity*pu_price)outBoundPuPrices from wh_outbound_details wod inner join wh_goods wg on wod.goods_id=wg.g_id inner join wh_outbound wo on wo.out_id=wod.out_id where wo.`status`='done' GROUP BY goods_id ORDER BY outBoundTimes desc,outBoundQuantitys desc, outBoundPuPrices desc

SELECT SUM(quantity_inbound) AS inNum, SUM(quantity_inbound * pu_price) AS inPrice, ( SELECT COUNT(in_code) FROM wh_inbound WHERE in_id IN ( SELECT in_id FROM wh_inbound wh WHERE storage_date =CURDATE() ) ) AS documents FROM wh_inbound_details WHERE in_id IN ( SELECT in_id FROM wh_inbound WHERE storage_date = CURDATE() );

SELECT SUM(outbound_quantity) AS outNum, SUM(outbound_quantity * pu_price) AS outPrice, ( SELECT COUNT(out_code) FROM wh_outbound WHERE out_id IN ( SELECT out_id FROM wh_outbound wh WHERE outbound_date =CURDATE() ) ) AS documents FROM wh_outbound_details WHERE out_id IN ( SELECT out_id FROM wh_outbound WHERE outbound_date = CURDATE() );

SELECT SUM(quantity_inbound) AS inNum, SUM(quantity_inbound * pu_price) AS inPrice, ( SELECT COUNT(in_code) FROM wh_inbound WHERE in_id IN ( SELECT in_id FROM wh_inbound wh WHERE storage_date =DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY) ) ) AS documents FROM wh_inbound_details WHERE in_id IN ( SELECT in_id FROM wh_inbound WHERE storage_date =DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY) );

SELECT SUM(outbound_quantity) AS outNum, SUM(outbound_quantity * pu_price) AS outPrice, ( SELECT COUNT(out_code) FROM wh_outbound WHERE out_id IN ( SELECT out_id FROM wh_outbound wh WHERE outbound_date =DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY) ) ) AS documents FROM wh_outbound_details WHERE out_id IN ( SELECT out_id FROM wh_outbound WHERE outbound_date = DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY) );
